subject: Summer or Fall Internship?
body:
Hey Pavi -

I am a hiring manager here at Zipline, and I received your email from Ian. I am the Avionics Test Manager, and I would love to chat with you about potential opportunities!

Are you by chance still looking for a summer or fall internship?

Looking forward to connecting soon!

Alisha

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Pavi Dhiman <pavidhiman22@gmail.com>
Date: Wed, Jan 22, 2025 at 9:33 AM
Subject: Here’s How I Can Add Value: Summer 2025 Internship
To: <ian.woodbury@flyzipline.com>, <ian@flyzipline.com>
